channel.title: Help Please
channel.description:
Every time I log out it does this
[code]Exception encountered while parsing incoming packets from Josh. java.lang.StringIndexOutOfBoundsException: String index out of range: 19 at java.lang.String.getChars(String.java:849) at java.io.BufferedWriter.write(BufferedWriter.java:208) at client.savegame(client.java:17955) at client.logout(client.java:10086) at clickingMost.clicking(clickingMost.java:318) at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:15529) at client.packetProcess(client.java:16889) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:268) at process.run(process.java:23) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) Error with player 1, Josh java.lang.StringIndexOutOfBoundsException: String index out of range: 19 at java.lang.String.getChars(String.java:849) at java.io.BufferedWriter.write(BufferedWriter.java:208) at client.savegame(client.java:17955) at client.logout(client.java:10086) at PlayerHandler.saveGame(PlayerHandler.java:376) at PlayerHandler.removePlayer(PlayerHandler.java:368) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:281) at process.run(process.java:23) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) String index out of range: 19 String index out of range: 19[/code]

item.title: Help Please
item.dc:creator: @Omg_iz_ben Omg iz ben
item.description:
@Omg_iz_ben wrote:

im not sure what that is, but it happens to me sometimes…
anyways, if u log out and it says that, why’s it matter? your logged off.

or do u mean it logs u off and says that?

Read full topic
